contentList.content: Hailing from a divine bloodline, these beings have abilities beyond those of a regular half-elf.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> increases by [1], and your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">jump</LSTag> distance increases by [2].
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
